text: Pereskia bahiensis is a species of cactus that is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Pereskioideae Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Cacti of South America Category:Flora of Bahia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pereskia bahiensis
